keyMoments.title: Reveals Ami Ami no Mi Powers
keyMoments.description: Largo reveals he has eaten the Ami Ami no Mi Devil Fruit, demonstrating his ability to create nets with a '120% success rate' for capturing anything.
keyMoments.significance: First revelation of Largo's Devil Fruit abilities, establishing him as a formidable Devil Fruit user.
keyMoments.quote: I have eaten the Ami Ami no Mi! My nets have a 120% success rate!

keyMoments.title: Captures Zoro and Sanji
keyMoments.description: Largo successfully traps both Zoro and Sanji in his sticky, high-tensile-strength nets, demonstrating the effectiveness of his powers against strong opponents.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Largo's combat prowess and the threat level he poses to the Straw Hat crew.

keyMoments.title: Demonstrates Material-Enhanced Nets
keyMoments.description: Largo reveals advanced applications of his Devil Fruit by ingesting materials like metal, boiling water, and fire to create specialized nets with different properties.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the versatility and danger of the Ami Ami no Mi beyond basic net creation.

abilities.abilityName: Ami Ami no Mi - Net Creation
abilities.description: Creates sticky nets with high tensile strength from his body, capable of trapping powerful opponents.

abilities.abilityName: Ami Ami no Mi - Material Absorption
abilities.description: Ingests various materials (metal, fire, boiling water) to create nets with those properties, enabling specialized attacks.

abilities.abilityName: Ami Ami no Mi - Net Transformation
abilities.description: Transforms his entire body into netting, dispersing physical impact across the net surface similar to Logia intangibility.

relationships.description: Largo's first mate and trusted second-in-command of the Amigo Pirates. They share a genuine bond.
Largo seeks to join Shiki's fleet as the 51st division commander, showing deep respect for the legendary pirate.

reveals.information: Ate the Ami Ami no Mi (Net-Net Fruit), a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit
Can ingest materials to create specialized nets with different properties
Can transform his body into netting to disperse physical attacks

keyMoments.title: Attempts Self-Sacrifice
keyMoments.description: Boss attempts to surrender himself to the Amigo Pirates to protect the villagers of Little East Blue from harm, showing his protective nature.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Boss's loyalty and selflessness toward those who cared for him.

keyMoments.title: Premature Molting Transformation
keyMoments.description: Boss undergoes a premature molting transformation, emerging with teal coloring, larger size, enhanced tusks, and temporarily increased power.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Boss's unique biological ability and establishes the cost of premature transformation.

keyMoments.title: Fire Breathing Rescue
keyMoments.description: Boss emits fire from his horn to burn away Largo's nets, freeing Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji, but collapses from the strain.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Boss's fire-breathing ability, which proves crucial for rescuing the Straw Hats.

abilities.description: Emits fire from his horn, powerful enough to burn through Largo's Devil Fruit nets.
Can shed his shell and transform, gaining increased size, power, and new coloration. Normally occurs monthly but can happen prematurely under stress.
Possesses incredible stamina and can withstand powerful attacks without severe injury.

relationships.description: Boss shares a deep bond with Yoko, who found him in the forest and cares for him. He reminds her of her deceased father.

evolutionMoments.description: Boss attempts to surrender himself to protect Yoko and the village.

reveals.information: Was created by Dr. Indigo as part of Shiki's army of mutant animals
Can emit fire from his horn
Undergoes molting transformations that increase his size and power

keyMoments.title: Witnesses Boss's Self-Sacrifice Attempt
keyMoments.description: Yoko watches as Boss attempts to surrender himself to protect her and the village, deepening her emotional connection to him.
keyMoments.significance: Reinforces the bond between Yoko and Boss and her growing trust in the Straw Hats who refuse to let Boss be taken.

relationships.description: Yoko found Boss in the forest and formed a deep friendship. Boss reminds her of her deceased Marine father.
Initially distrustful of pirates, Yoko begins to trust Luffy as he demonstrates his willingness to protect Boss and the village.

evolutionMoments.description: Yoko watches as Luffy refuses to let Boss be taken, further changing her view of pirates.
